framework.name: AIDA
framework.description: Classic persuasion framework for sales copy

stage.name: Attention
stage.purpose: Grab the reader's attention with a compelling headline

techniques.technique: Use power words and emotional triggers

stage.example: "Are you tired of working 60-hour weeks just to stay afloat?"

stage.name: Interest
stage.purpose: Build interest by identifying with their problem

techniques.technique: Describe the pain point in detail

stage.example: "Every entrepreneur faces the same challenge: too much to do, not enough time. You're juggling clients, managing projects, and trying to grow your business, but you feel like you're barely keeping your head above water."

stage.name: Desire
stage.purpose: Create desire by presenting the solution and benefits

techniques.technique: Paint a picture of the desired outcome

stage.example: "Imagine having an extra 20 hours per week to focus on what really matters. Our automation platform has helped 500+ entrepreneurs reclaim their time and double their revenue."

stage.name: Action
stage.purpose: Motivate immediate action with a clear call-to-action

techniques.technique: Make the next step crystal clear

stage.example: "Start your 14-day free trial today - no credit card required. Join the thousands of entrepreneurs who've already transformed their businesses."

framework.name: PAS
framework.description: Problem-Agitate-Solution framework for addressing pain points

stage.name: Problem
stage.purpose: Identify and articulate the target audience's main problem
stage.example: "Your website visitors are leaving without buying anything"

stage.name: Agitate
stage.purpose: Intensify the emotional impact of the problem
stage.example: "Every day you delay, you're losing potential customers to competitors who have optimized their conversion funnels. That's money walking out the door."

stage.name: Solution
stage.purpose: Present your product/service as the solution
stage.example: "Our conversion optimization toolkit identifies exactly what's stopping visitors from buying and fixes it automatically."

framework.name: Before_After_Bridge
framework.description: Transformation-focused framework showing the journey from current state to desired state

stage.name: Before
stage.example: "You're spending 4 hours every day on manual data entry, leaving no time for strategic work"

stage.name: After
stage.purpose: Paint the picture of the ideal future state
stage.example: "Imagine completing all your data processing in 30 minutes and spending the rest of your day on high-value activities that grow your business"

stage.name: Bridge
stage.purpose: Position your solution as the bridge between before and after
stage.example: "Our AI-powered automation platform is the bridge that gets you from overwhelmed to optimized in just 30 days"

framework.name: PASTOR
framework.description: Comprehensive framework for longer-form sales copy

structure.stage: Intensify the consequences of not solving it
Share a relatable story or case study

template.pattern: "How to [Achieve Desired Outcome] in [Time Frame] [Without Common Objection]"
template.example: "How to Double Your Email Open Rates in 30 Days Without Spending More on Ads"
"7 Proven Ways to Increase Conversion Rates This Month"
"Are You Losing Customers Because of Slow Website Loading Times?"
"From Struggling Freelancer to Six-Figure Agency: The Complete Blueprint"
"Warning: This Marketing Mistake Is Costing You $10,000 Per Month"

template.pattern: "The [Adjective] Secret [Authority Figure] Don't Want You to Know"
template.example: "The Simple Secret Top Marketers Don't Want You to Know"

section.name: warm_welcome
section.content: Thank the subscriber and confirm their decision
section.example: "Welcome to the [Company] family! You made a smart choice by joining thousands of entrepreneurs who are already growing their businesses faster."

section.name: set_expectations
section.content: Outline what they'll receive and when
section.example: "Over the next 5 days, I'll send you my proven strategies for [specific outcome]. Each email contains actionable tips you can implement immediately."

section.name: first_value
section.example: "To get started, here's my #1 tip that helped client X achieve Y result in Z timeframe..."

section.name: soft_cta
section.example: "Ready to dive deeper? Check out this free resource: [link]"

section.name: personalized_opening
section.content: Address the reader personally and reference their interests
section.example: "Hi [Name], I noticed you downloaded our guide on [topic], so I thought you'd be interested in this exclusive opportunity..."

section.name: problem_reminder
section.content: Remind them of the problem you solve
section.example: "You know how frustrating it is when [specific problem]. You've probably tried [common solutions] but still aren't seeing the results you want."

section.name: solution_presentation
section.content: Present your solution with specific benefits
section.example: "That's exactly why I created [product/service]. It [specific benefit 1], [specific benefit 2], and [specific benefit 3]."

section.name: social_proof
section.example: "Just last week, [client name] used this exact system to [specific result]. Here's what they said: '[testimonial]'"

section.name: offer_details
section.example: "For the next 48 hours only, you can get [product] for just $X (normally $Y). This offer expires Friday at midnight."

section.name: strong_cta
section.example: "Click here to claim your copy before this offer expires: [button]"

section.name: gentle_reminder
section.example: "Hi [Name], I noticed you were checking out [product name] but didn't complete your purchase. No worries - it happens to the best of us!"

section.name: benefit_reinforcement
section.content: Remind them why they wanted it
section.example: "Just to refresh your memory, [product] will help you [primary benefit] so you can [desired outcome]."

section.name: urgency_creation
section.example: "I'm holding your spot for the next 24 hours, but after that, I can't guarantee availability."

section.name: easy_completion
section.content: Make it easy to complete purchase

elements.element: Compelling headline with clear value proposition
3-5 key benefits of the lead magnet
